Name: SCT016 - Safe clean and tidy email to the customer
Output_template:
{"subject":"Safe Clean and Tidy - Unauthorised waste form received","fromName":"{NoReplyEmail_N} ","from":"{NoReplyEmail} ","recipients_to":"{person/Email_Address_out}","recipients_cc":"","recipients_bcc":"","pdf_attachments":"","body":"
Dear customer,

Thank you for reporting the issue relating to unauthorised waste to Portsmouth City Council. Your reference number is {case_ref}.

We will now begin to investigate the issue, and take action where possible.

Please note that in some cases we may not be able to provide the solution, such as if the waste is on private land.

We may be in touch if we need more information from you.

Yours sincerely,

The Safe, Clean and Tidy Team

Portsmouth City Council
